MemoryInfobox.name: Feverish Deserters
MemoryInfobox.description: 'An herbalist, anxious for the feverish deserters she had seen, claimed they would infect all in their path if they did not receive the medicine she had made.'

General_Description: '''Feverish Deserters''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: An herbalist sought the help of a [[mercenary]]. Kassandra answered.
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Deserting soldiers are spreading sickness in their path. They may not realize it. Please hurry, I need a mercenary quickly.'' She sought out the herbalist and addressed her. *'''Kassandra:''' ''I saw the message you left on the board. What's happening?'' *'''Woman:''' ''A group of [[Sparta]]n deserters just passed through. They were feverish, probably contagious. I tried to help them, but they wouldn't stop.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''They sound like fools. But then again, they are deserters.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I made up some ''[[St. John's wort|hypereikon]]'' extract to treat them. But it may already be too late.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''Too late?'' *'''Woman:''' ''If they see reason and take the medicine in time, they might live.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''But if they don't, they're in for agonizing deaths.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Yes. Them and anyone in the next town where they take leave.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''You want me to kill the Spartan deserters for their dishonor.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Are you up for it?'' (Accept - Those cowards are mine.) *'''Kassandra:''' ''I'll take care of it.'' *'''Woman:''' ''Thank you, ''misthios. *'''Kassandra:''' ''You can leave everything to me.'' Kassandra sought out the deserters and slew them before returning to the herbalist. *'''Woman:''' ''You're back. Have you killed them?'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''I took care of them. Every last one.'' *'''Woman:''' ''I knew the gods intended us to meet. Please, take this.'' *'''Kassandra:''' ''That'll do.''
Section_Trivia: *It is possible that this quest has Kassandra delivering the medicine to the soldiers/their commander, instead of killing the deserters.
